sectionOne.title: To stay up to date with the latest Globechain news follow us on our social media channels.
sectionOne.subtitle: We share how our marketplace is leading the way globally while having fun, working hard and making an impact.

award.description: Top European Fintech startups to watch in 2020
May Al-Karooni recognized as top 50 women leading in Real Estate
Winner Business Green Leaders Circular Economy of the Year
Dell Circular Economy People’s Choice Award

small.title: Disruptive CEO Nation
small.description: May Al-Karooni is the CEO & founder of Globechain, a reuse marketplace that connects corporates to charities, small businesses and people to redistribute unneeded items, generating social impact data.

bigMedia.title: Top Trends In Sustainable Fashion Today
bigMedia.description: Sustainability in fashion is a hot topic, but many consumers still want fast fashion

small.title: Waste Not, Want Not
small.description: According to the Environmental Protection Agency, three million tons of usable office furniture end up in landfills every year. In this glut of others' trash, Globechain Founder May Al-Karooni saw a trove of hidden treasure.

bigMedia.title: The companies delivering on sustainability
bigMedia.description: IBM’s Roberto Battistoni highlights the businesses championing sustainable consumerism and the role emerging technologies can play.

small.title: The Woman Laying Waste to Waste
small.description: May Al-Karooni is the founder of Globechain.com, a reuse marketplace that connects corporates to charities and small and midsized businesses to reuse and redistribute unneeded items, particularly construction and building fit-out materials, and generates social impact data for its members.
